posts._title: Hugo del Carril – Más allá del olvido AKA Beyond Oblivion (1956)
posts.title: Más allá del olvido
posts.excerpt: Quote:Más allá del olvido (Beyond Oblivion) is one of the best films made in Argentina and the best Hugo del Carril directed. Based on the novel Bruges-la-Morte by Georges Rodenbach, this melodrama tells the story of Fernando (del Carril) that cannot get over the premature death of his beloved wife Blanca, so he decides to …

posts.title: A
posts.excerpt: In 1996, filmmaker Tatsuya Mori received permission to tape the inside activities of Japan’s religious cult Aum Shinrikyo—the enigmatic group that released sarin gas into Tokyo’s subway system in 1995. Focusing on the group’s bumbling, confused spokesperson Araki Hiroshi, Mori caught much more than the cult’s daily life with his camera. He captured the media …

posts.title: Boss Nigger
posts.excerpt: Synopsis:Two black bounty hunters ride into a small town out West in pursuit of an outlaw. They discover that the town has no sheriff, and soon take over that position, much against the will of the mostly white townsfolk. They raise hell, chase women, and milk the locals for cash, while waiting for the opportunity …

posts.title: II
posts.excerpt: An old groom walks in the open horizon towards a bride waiting for him. They meet but the distance between them starts to grow once again.

posts._title: Gakuryû Ishii – Yume no ginga AKA Labyrinth of Dreams (1997)
posts.title: Yume no ginga
posts.excerpt: Symopsis:‘Tomiko is a conductor in a rural bus driven by the handsome Niitaka. Tomiko had received a letter from her best friend Tsuyako, a conductor in another bus company, just after Tsuyako was killed in a bus accident. Tsuyako wrote that she felt that her fiance and driver, Niitaka, planned to kill her. Tomiko therefore …

posts.title: Astrometal
posts.excerpt: Two boys and a girl prepare for nightclubbing in the heart of Athens. Arriving, they face a deserted club, where music plays blaring but there is no one to listen. There, one by one falls asleep as they surrender themselves in a collective dream.

posts._title: Danièle Huillet & Jean-Marie Straub – Les yeux ne veulent pas en tout temps se fermer, ou Peut-être qu’un jour Rome se permettra de choisir à son tour AKA Eyes Do Not Want to Close at All Times or Perhaps One Day Rome Will Permit Herself to Choose in Her Turn AKA Othon (1970)
posts.title: Les yeux ne veulent pas en tout temps se fermer, ou Peut-être qu’un jour Rome se permettra de choisir à son tour
posts.excerpt: Quote:Straub-Huillet’s first color film, Othon (Les yeux ne veulent pas en tout temps se fermer, ou Peut-être qu’un jour Rome se permettra de choisir à son tour) adapts a lesser-known Corneille tragedy from 1664, which in turn was based on an episode of imperial court intrigue chronicled in Tacitus’s Histories. The costuming is classical, and …
posts.titleEnglish: Eyes Do Not Want to Close at All Times or Perhaps One Day Rome Will Permit Herself to Choose in Her Turn AKA Othon

posts.title: Besonders wertvoll
posts.excerpt: Pornography in the service of politics. An outrageous provocation, this attack on reactionary German legislation discriminating against young film directors, features head-on, close-up shots of a penis ‘mouthing’ the parliamentary defence of the law by its author. This is followed by masturbation of the organ by an anonymous female hand, ending with ejaculation into the …

posts._title: Efthimis Kosemund Sanidis – Aktisto Fos AKA Unbuilt Light (2017)
posts.title: Aktisto Fos
posts.excerpt: Time strung together by recollections, encounters and dreams. A farewell over a man’s last three months before his final transformation.

posts._title: Kazuhiko Yamaguchi – Onna hissatsu ken: kiki ippatsu AKA Sister Street Fighter: Hanging By a Thread (1974)
posts.title: Onna hissatsu ken: kiki ippatsu
posts.excerpt: Synopsis:The daughter of a powerful man, Birei, disappears and Koryu is sent to Tokyo to investigate. She soon discovers that Birei was kidnapped in a gangster’s diamond smuggling ring that is very close to home. Soon she is surrounded by the gangster’s army of martial arts experts…
posts.titleEnglish: Sister Street Fighter: Hanging By a Thread
